languages.text: "Передай наш подарок тому, кто ничего не видит, но все слышит. И истина тебе откроется".
"Give our gift to the one who sees nothing but hears everything. Then the truth will be revealed to you."
languages.original_text: "Передай наш подарок тому, кто ничего не видит, но все слышит. И истина тебе откроется".

traits.locale_text: "Give our gift to the one who sees nothing but hears everything. Then the truth will be revealed to you."
"Give our gift to the one who sees nothing but hears everything. Then the truth will be revealed to you."
"Give our gift to the one who sees nothing but hears everything. Then the truth will be revealed to you."
"Give our gift to the one who sees nothing but hears everything. Then the truth will be revealed to you."
"Give our gift to the one who sees nothing but hears everything. Then the truth will be revealed to you."
"Give our gift to the one who sees nothing but hears everything. Then the truth will be revealed to you."

languages.text: «Entrega nuestro regalo a quien no ve nada, pero lo oye todo. Así, la verdad te será revelada».
languages.original_text: "Give our gift to the one who sees nothing but hears everything. Then the truth will be revealed to you."

traits.locale_text: «Entrega nuestro regalo a quien no ve nada, pero lo oye todo. Así, la verdad te será revelada».

languages.text: 「我らの贈り物を、何も見ず、しかしすべてを聞くものに与えよ。さすれば真理が明らかになるだろう」
languages.original_text: "Give our gift to the one who sees nothing but hears everything. Then the truth will be revealed to you."

traits.locale_text: 「我らの贈り物を、何も見ず、しかしすべてを聞くものに与えよ。さすれば真理が明らかになるだろう」

languages.text: “将我们的礼物送给那个什么都看不到、但却什么都能听得到的人。这样一来，真理便会显现在你们面前。”
languages.original_text: "Give our gift to the one who sees nothing but hears everything. Then the truth will be revealed to you."

traits.locale_text: “将我们的礼物送给那个什么都看不到、但却什么都能听得到的人。这样一来，真理便会显现在你们面前。”

languages.text: "Gebt unser Geschenk demjenigen, der nichts sieht, aber alles hört. Dann wird Euch die Wahrheit offenbart."
languages.original_text: "Give our gift to the one who sees nothing but hears everything. Then the truth will be revealed to you."

traits.locale_text: "Gebt unser Geschenk demjenigen, der nichts sieht, aber alles hört. Dann wird Euch die Wahrheit offenbart."

languages.text: « Donnez notre cadeau à l'être qui ne voit rien, mais entend tout. Alors, la vérité vous sera révélée. »
languages.original_text: "Give our gift to the one who sees nothing but hears everything. Then the truth will be revealed to you."

traits.locale_text: « Donnez notre cadeau à l'être qui ne voit rien, mais entend tout. Alors, la vérité vous sera révélée. »

languages.text: "Hiçbir şey görmeyip her şeyi işitene armağanımızı sun. Ardından hakikat, gözlerinin önünde serilecek."
languages.original_text: "Give our gift to the one who sees nothing but hears everything. Then the truth will be revealed to you."
